edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.VotingGame

Class VotingClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.cs262.DistributedGame.VotingGame.VotingClient

  • public class VotingClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The VotingClient class contains the code that the clients run in the Voting Game. Clients see a display with the current number and can vote by pressing the up or down arrow keys.
    Version:
    1.0, April 2014
    Author:
    Twitch Plays Battleship Group

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main function that clients execute. Connects the clients to the registry and shows them the game screen and allows them to vote up or down on the number shown.
        Parameters:
        args - An array of strings given at the command line containing the host and port
